GetClassType.name: GetClassType
GetClassType.description: Returns a type of the ApiDrawing class.

SetSize.name: SetSize
SetSize.description: Sets the size of the object (image, shape, chart) bounding box.

params.name: nWidth
params.description: The object width measured in English measure units.

params.name: nHeight
params.description: The object height measured in English measure units.

SetWrappingStyle.name: SetWrappingStyle
SetWrappingStyle.description:
Sets the wrapping type of the current object (image, shape, chart). One of the following wrapping style types can be set:

  • "inline" - the object is considered to be a part of the text, like a character, so when the text moves, the object moves as well. In this case the positioning options are inaccessible. If one of the following styles is selected, the object can be moved independently of the text and positioned on the page exactly:
  • "square" - the text wraps the rectangular box that bounds the object.
  • "tight" - the text wraps the actual object edges.
  • "through" - the text wraps around the object edges and fills in the open white space within the object.
  • "topAndBottom" - the text is only above and below the object.
  • "behind" - the text overlaps the object.
  • "inFront" - the object overlaps the text.

params.name: sType
params.description: The wrapping style type available for the object.

SetHorAlign.name: SetHorAlign
SetHorAlign.description: Specifies how the floating object will be horizontally aligned.

params.name: sRelativeFrom
params.description: The document element which will be taken as a countdown point for the object horizontal alignment.

params.name: sAlign
params.description: The alignment type which will be used for the object horizontal alignment.

SetVerAlign.name: SetVerAlign
SetVerAlign.description: Specifies how the floating object will be vertically aligned.

params.name: sRelativeFrom
params.description: The document element which will be taken as a countdown point for the object vertical alignment.

params.name: sAlign
params.description: The alingment type which will be used for the object vertical alignment.

SetHorPosition.name: SetHorPosition
SetHorPosition.description: Sets the absolute measurement for the horizontal positioning of the floating object.

params.name: sRelativeFrom
params.description: The document element which will be taken as a countdown point for the object horizontal alignment.

params.name: nDistance
params.description: The distance from the right side of the document element to the floating object measured in English measure units.

SetVerPosition.name: SetVerPosition
SetVerPosition.description: Sets the absolute measurement for the vertical positioning of the floating object.

params.name: sRelativeFrom
params.description: The document element which will be taken as a countdown point for the object vertical alignment.

params.name: nDistance
params.description: The distance from the bottom part of the document element to the floating object measured in English measure units.

SetDistances.name: SetDistances
SetDistances.description: Specifies the minimum distance which will be maintained between the edges of the current drawing object and any subsequent text.

params.name: nLeft
params.description: The distance from the left side of the current object and the subsequent text run measured in English measure units.

params.name: nTop
params.description: The distance from the top side of the current object and the preceding text run measured in English measure units.

params.name: nRight
params.description: The distance from the right side of the current object and the subsequent text run measured in English measure units.

params.name: nBottom
params.description: The distance from the bottom side of the current object and the subsequent text run measured in English measure units.

GetParentParagraph.name: GetParentParagraph
GetParentParagraph.description: Returns a parent paragraph that contains the graphic object.

GetParentContentControl.name: GetParentContentControl
GetParentContentControl.description: Returns a parent content control that contains the graphic object.

GetParentTable.name: GetParentTable
GetParentTable.description: Returns a parent table that contains the graphic object.

GetParentTableCell.name: GetParentTableCell
GetParentTableCell.description: Returns a parent table cell that contains the graphic object.

InsertInContentControl.name: InsertInContentControl
InsertInContentControl.description: Wraps the graphic object with a rich text content control.

params.name: nType
params.description: Defines if this method returns the ApiBlockLvlSdt (nType === 1) or ApiDrawing (any value except 1) object.

InsertParagraph.name: InsertParagraph
InsertParagraph.description: Inserts a paragraph at the specified position.

params.name: paragraph
params.description: Text or paragraph.

params.name: sPosition
params.description: The position where the text or paragraph will be inserted ("before" or "after" the drawing specified).

params.name: beRNewPara
params.description: Defines if this method returns a new paragraph (true) or the current ApiDrawing (false).

AddBreak.name: AddBreak
AddBreak.description: Inserts a break at the specified location in the main document.

params.name: breakType
params.description: The break type: page break (0) or line break (1).

params.name: position
params.description: The position where the page or line break will be inserted ("before" or "after" the current drawing).

params.name: bFlip
params.description: Specifies if the figure will be flipped horizontally or not.

params.name: bFlip
params.description: Specifies if the figure will be flipped vertically or not.

ScaleHeight.name: ScaleHeight
ScaleHeight.description: Scales the height of the figure using the specified coefficient.

params.name: coefficient
params.description: The coefficient by which the figure height will be scaled.

ScaleWidth.name: ScaleWidth
ScaleWidth.description: Scales the width of the figure using the specified coefficient.

params.name: coefficient
params.description: The coefficient by which the figure width will be scaled.

Fill.name: Fill
Fill.description: Sets the fill formatting properties to the current graphic object.

params.name: oFill
params.description: The fill type used to fill the graphic object.

SetOutLine.name: SetOutLine
SetOutLine.description: Sets the outline properties to the specified graphic object.

params.name: oStroke
params.description: The stroke used to create the graphic object outline.

GetNextDrawing.name: GetNextDrawing
GetNextDrawing.description: Returns the next inline drawing object if exists.

GetPrevDrawing.name: GetPrevDrawing
GetPrevDrawing.description: Returns the previous inline drawing object if exists.

ToJSON.name: ToJSON
ToJSON.description: Converts the ApiDrawing object into the JSON object.

params.name: bWriteNumberings
params.description: Specifies if the used numberings will be written to the JSON object or not.

params.name: bWriteStyles
params.description: Specifies if the used styles will be written to the JSON object or not.

GetWidth.name: GetWidth
GetWidth.description: Returns the width of the current drawing.

GetHeight.name: GetHeight
GetHeight.description: Returns the height of the current drawing.

GetLockValue.name: GetLockValue
GetLockValue.description: Returns the lock value for the specified lock type of the current drawing.

params.name: sType
params.description: Lock type in the string format.

SetLockValue.name: SetLockValue
SetLockValue.description: Sets the lock value to the specified lock type of the current drawing.

params.name: sType
params.description: Lock type in the string format.

params.name: bValue
params.description: Specifies if the specified lock is applied to the current drawing.

SetDrawingPrFromDrawing.name: SetDrawingPrFromDrawing
SetDrawingPrFromDrawing.description: Sets the properties from another drawing to the current drawing. The following properties will be copied: horizontal and vertical alignment, distance between the edges of the current drawing object and any subsequent text, wrapping style, drawing name, title and description.

params.name: oAnotherDrawing
params.description: The drawing which properties will be set to the current drawing.
